name: Reliquary of the Golden Dawn
tooltip:
Reliquary of the Golden Dawn

Cost: 2700
+25 Ability Haste
+40 Armor
+400 Health
+40 Magic Resistance

UNIQUE Passive - Consecrate: Grant nearby allied champions 5 bonus armor and 5 bonus magic resistance.

UNIQUE Passive: Empowers your other Legendary items to increase Consecrate's bonus resistances by 2.

UNIQUE Active - Devotion: Grant nearby allies a 250 - 420 (based on target's level) shield that decays over 2.5 seconds (90 second cooldown).
